thread.title: Pics: Salman Khan having a fun time with nephew Ahil
thread.title_full: Pics: Salman Khan having a fun time with nephew Ahil | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Pics: Salman Khan having a fun time with nephew Ahil
text:
Salman Khan finished shooting for Kabir Khan 's 'Tubelight' and headed straight to spend some quality time with his family. The actor, who tries to devote most of his off-time to his family, has been snapped with sister Arpita Khan Sharma 's son Ahil on many occasions. 

Kabir Khan's third journey with Salman Khan ends It's a wrap for the team of 'Tubelight' - superstar Salman Khan's third film with Kabir Khan, and the director can't wait to show it to the world. 
Salman's love for children is well-known, and Arpita shared a few pictures of her brother frolicking with her son. Arpita captioned one of the pictures, "Priceless moments ! Family first @beingsalmankhan" 



Priceless moments ! Family first @beingsalmankhan 

A photo posted by Arpita Khan Sharma (@arpitakhansharma) on Feb 8, 2017 at 1:14am PST 


❤️ @beingsalmankhan 

A photo posted by Arpita Khan Sharma (@arpitakhansharma) on Feb 8, 2017 at 1:24am PST 

The 'Sultan' star appears lying on the floor, with nephew Ahil on top of him. Cuteness overload indeed! 

The 51-year-old superstar will now proceed to shoot 'Tiger Zinda Hai' - sequel to his 2012 hit 'Ek Tha Tiger', with former girlfriend Katrina Kaif . 


Fans celebrate as Salman's twitter-family reaches 21 million!!! 01:15
